item.description:
Sorry guys, change in venue! Now we'll be doing karaoke at The Wave in Waltham so we can stick to the date and get out on a Friday night.

Great news though - free pool at The Wave from 5-7PM, then karaoke starts at 9ish. We've done this place before and it's a really low-key kinda place... not necessarily a beer haven, but a very fun place to get together on a Friday night. It can be a little bit hard to find on the first trip, so check out the directions here: http://www.wavesports....

The Wave's crowd is usually young and energetic and there is rarely a wait to sing karaoke! Huzzah! They also do pitchers which is a great way to get more bang for your buck in the drink vs. expense department... and it's our local stomping grounds. Why not? :)
item.how_to_find_us: Call me. 413-695-2121. We'll try to get a table.
item.name: Karaoke!
